oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Evaluation of the CARDY Potassium Meter as a point-of-care instrument for measurement of plasma and blood potassium concentrations in cattle
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Megahed, A. A.
Hiew, M. H.
Constable, P. D.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: analyzer
potassium concentration
plasma
blood
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A point-of-care analyzer ( CARDY K + meter C-131, www.horiba.co.jp) for the measurement of potassium concentration ([K]) has recently become available. The objective of this study was to validate the CARDY meter for the measurement of [K] in bovine plasma and blood.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2013; 142
